greeting: Welcome Chef! A world of cosmic culinary adventure awaits!
gameIntro:
Welcome to InterstellarChef, where you can embark on a culinary journey across the cosmos!
As a spaceship sous chef, you must travel near and far to gather the most rare and delectable ingredients in the universe.
Only then can you complete your dish and feed the crew!
newGameMessage: Would you like to start a new game? Yes or no
confirmQuitMessage: Are you sure you want to quit this game? Yes or No
goodbyeMessage: We really don't want to say Goodbye to you
helpMessage:
*********************************************** HELP ***********************************************
		Direction options: North, South, West, East, Up & Down
		go/walk/run/climb <Direction>: Moves character in selected direction
		get/grab/take <Item Name>: Adds item to Player's Inventory
		look/inspect/examine <Item Name>: Investigates Item
		use/utilize/apply <Item Name>: item disappears from your inventory once you use it
		help: Displays a list of valid commands
		quit: ends the game
****************************************************************************************************
promptActionMessage: What would you like to do? Enter 'help' for valid actions.
missingWordMessage: Looks like you forgot a word! Please try again.
invalidActionMessage: You can't do that! Try again.
